name: Omori
summary:
During Omori's fundraising on Patreon, 2 portable ports were made as stretch goals. The 2 ports were for the PlayStation Vita and the Nintendo 3DS, however only the 3DS goal was reached in the end, with the port being announced soon after.

The Nintendo 3DS port of the game was later cancelled due to the discontinuation of the system, with the Nintendo Switch port made to take it's place.
